channel.title: [IDEA] New Game Using RS Base [IDEA]
channel.description:
Well, i bet everyone here has coded or played rsps for years. nothing really new or special. it gets boring after a while.
After I was bored to death with the usual PI or Delta based leaches going around, nothing is usually new or exciting.
So I've been comming up with ideas to make a fully new game using the RS base as a game engine. I would completely wipe the client, so that no tabs exist, and only the simple I/O functions. and delete EVERYTHING on the server. Also make new landscapes and (maby) models (or custom ones).
and yet, all of this will still keep that same 317 'feel' of the game, while also its not boring or a copy of a copy.
i dont think this has ever been done before, but i think its a great idea.
SO! tell me what you think about it. PLEASE NO FLAMMING! (Also, im not sure if this is the right section for this, cuz its not a set 'server' but more of an idea.) thx, Daginith

item.title: [IDEA] New Game Using RS Base [IDEA]
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/219420-apocalyptism-first-person-shooter.html

Still good idea. I would suggest make same like rs but in 3th person.

Read full topic

item.title: [IDEA] New Game Using RS Base [IDEA]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:1, topic:426104”]Well, i bet everyone here has coded or played rsps for years. nothing really new or special. it gets boring after a while.

After I was bored to death with the usual PI or Delta based leaches going around, nothing is usually new or exciting.

So I’ve been comming up with ideas to make a fully new game using the RS base as a game engine. I would completely wipe the client, so that no tabs exist, and only the simple I/O functions. and delete EVERYTHING on the server. Also make new landscapes and (maby) models (or custom ones).

and yet, all of this will still keep that same 317 ‘feel’ of the game, while also its not boring or a copy of a copy.

i dont think this has ever been done before, but i think its a great idea.

SO! tell me what you think about it. PLEASE NO FLAMMING! (Also, im not sure if this is the right section for this, cuz its not a set ‘server’ but more of an idea.)
thx,
Daginith[/quote]

Alot of people on R-S already do this. It’s still a good idea though.

Read full topic

item.title: [IDEA] New Game Using RS Base [IDEA]
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:3, topic:426104”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=528793.msg3856990#msg3856990 date=1324418126]
Make a server out of Assembly.
[/quote]
^^ or i could use binary 001001 011010 110100 101101…[/quote][quote=“runewings317, post:2, topic:426104”]Make a server out of Ruby… Then I’ll be impressed But no seriously, I think that PI is fine it’s just overly abused with it’s loading stuff… And Delta is over abused with it’s commands and customs, but it’s just like PI, it can be actually good! :D[/quote]
out of RUBY? hell, why not HTML. …and like i said, im just bored of the same thing again and again. i want to make something ‘new’.

Read full topic

item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Make a server out of Ruby… Then I’ll be impressed But no seriously, I think that PI is fine it’s just overly abused with it’s loading stuff… And Delta is over abused with it’s commands and customs, but it’s just like PI, it can be actually good!
